attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the drug TARCEVA available to our sister Eve Smith on NHS. The same as anyone she does not want to nor deserve to die just because something is not readily available, these drugs are designed and manufacured to prolong and ease cancer sufferers lives so why can they not be used for the sole purpose they are made for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
